thoughts.text: I should use the execute_shell command to check if there are any rental companies or lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kayaking.

thoughts.speak: I should use the execute_shell command to check if there are any rental companies or lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kayaking.

args.command_line: curl -s https://www.google.com/search?q=rental+companies+and+lodging+options+near+Naeroyfjord+for+kayaking | grep -Eo 'https://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*' | grep -v 'googleusercontent' | grep -v 'webcache' | grep -v 'googleadservices' | grep -v 'google.com/search' | grep -v 'google.com/maps' | grep -v 'google.com/flights' | grep -v 'google.com/hotels' | grep -v 'google.com/travel' | grep -v 'google.com/shopping' | grep -v 'google.com/books' | grep -v 'google.com/news' | grep -v 'google.com/finance' | grep -v 'google.com/videos' | grep -v 'google.com/images' | grep -v 'google.com/preferences' | grep -v 'google.com/history' | grep -v 'google.com/accounts' | grep -v 'google.com/services'
